li.label: war hawk
li.description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes war and weaponry. While {PAWN_pronoun} prefers fighting {PAWN_possessive} enemies from a distance with a ranged weapon, {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind wielding a melee weapon. {PAWN_nameDef} will be unhappy when {PAWN_pronoun} is unarmed.
They are extremely stubborn and confident of their beliefs, and will try to pester others to join them more often.
